thread.title: Last chance to see David Bowie on tour
thread.title_full: Last chance to see David Bowie on tour - Telegraph

author: Nick Trend
title: Last chance to see David Bowie on tour
text: One of the biggest hits of the London exhibition scene in recent years was the “David Bowie is” show at the V&A in 2013 . The exhibition - which comprised more than 300 objects from Bowie’s archives, including handwritten lyrics, original costumes, fashion, photography, film, music videos, set designs and his own instruments - was seen by more than 300,000 visitors in London, and has been on tour around the world ever since. There a costumes, handwritten lyrics and photographs to peruse Photo: GETTY If you missed it first time around, however, you have one last chance to catch the exhibition. After re-incarnations in Chicago, Paris and Melbourne, David Bowie is to open at the Groninger Museum in Groningen, Holland, on December 12. • Who are the most influential Londoners of all time? The exhibition has been on tour since it closed at the V&A Photo: GETTY In the far north of Holland, Groningen is a pleasant university town of canals, medieval churches and houses, some striking contemporary architecture and lots and lots of cyclists . There is plenty to enjoy for a relaxed weekend away, but if you wanted just to make a day trip the the exhibition, there is a direct flight from London Southend with Flybe which allows you to leave early in the morning and return at 5.30pm. Fares from £60 return if you book far enough in advance, and choose your dates carefully. • David Bowie's Berlin It is soon heading to the pretty Dutch city of Groningen Photo: AP/FOTOLIA David Bowie will be on show at the Groninger Museum ( groningermuseum.nl ) from December 11, 2015 - March 13, 2016. Admission is 23 euros. Be sure to check flight availability for the date you wish to travel, then secure tickets on the museum website before you book flights. Tourist information ( toerisme.groningen.nl/en ); Flybe ( flybe.com ); Southend airport ( southendairport.com ). Telegraphtravel
